title: Who actually even plays normals?
body: Anyone here over bronze or unranked that actually plays solo/duo normals?

replies.body: I play ranked when there is too much bs in normals, I play normals when too much bs in ranked. then i realise both have too much bs so I play aram.

I frequently get queued with Silvers so not just Bronze or Unranked, sometimes I will get Golds but rarely.

Recently I started to have more Ranked dudes in my games, I have met Plats a few times but I think it's probably due to preseason.

In short yes, there are not just Bronze or Unranked playing norms, but they (above Silver) are not all that common to meet it seems unless ofc, you have high normal game mmr.
I love the new boards discussions like this were never possible on Forums. I only just decided to use boards last week and it looks cool and there is way less spammers :)
I never seem to have fun in Ranked. It's always tryhard city, doing anything for that win.

I play normals when i don't want to take the game seriously

{{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}}
i dont play ranked, they use words or have setups that nothing like normals, plus they scream and yell at every one, just not into alienated players.
The last time I SoloQed a norms I ended up finding a 4 man premade who followed me around the map until the enemy team decided to finally end the game after 40 mins of farming lanes....

normals is for practice and trying out new champs/builds/stratagies.

Also for having fun without the pressure of having to tryhard
